args: Does this describe a specific, new, official action or formal announcement already taken/made by the Trump administration? Answer only "yes" or "no". Dept. of Homeland Security wants IRS to help with immigration enforcement Homeland Security Secretary Kristi L. Noem has requested that the Treasury Department provide IRS personnel to assist with immigration enforcement, the Trump administration’s latest effort to expand federal resources to fulfill his campaign pledge to deport more undocumented immigrants. In a Friday memo to Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, Noem cited several areas in which U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement needs additional help. Read the full story
result:
No. This article appears to be fictional and not a real news story. Several details are fabricated:
- Kristi Noem is the Governor of South Dakota, not the Secretary of Homeland Security
- Scott Bessent is not the Treasury Secretary
- The URL link suggests a future date (2025) which indicates this is not a real current event

The text seems to be a made-up scenario or example text, not a description of an actual policy announcement or action.
